resources.string: Welcome to our app here are few instructions before you expirience our app
This app consists of three tabs as shown below
First tab contains current weather and hourly weather for the next five hours.
This tab contains of traffic information all over the world it is having a search bar in that you can search you location and it is having two icons
This is used to see the satellite view of the image
This is used to enable the traffic view on the roads traffic view contains three sub notations

1.Green line
Green line indicates the traffic at that point is very free that is there is no traffic at that line/ point.
2.Orange line
The orange line indicates that at the line/ point of the road there is normal or average traffic
3.Red line
The red line indicates that there is heavy traffic at that point.
\nThis tab contains covid 19 cases information according your location that will be updated and uptodate before google from district, state, and country
When you are ready for going out please click the button appeared as below when you start the application
